subject: Why 90% of side hustles will fail in 2026 ğŸ“‰
previewText: Are you building an asset, or just working a second job?
content:
It's a trap.

Most 'side hustles' are just glorified second jobs.

If you drive for Uber, you are trading time for money.
If you freelance on Upwork, you are trading time for money.

If you stop working, the money stops.

That is NOT a business.

In the 2026 Side Hustle Blueprint (which I sent yesterday), I talked about building ASSETS.

If you haven't read it yet, go grab it now:

Get the Blueprint

Tomorrow, I'll show you the exact tools I use to build these assets fast.

-[Ken]
